it.polimi.se2019.server.controller

Class WeaponShot

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.controller.WeaponShot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class WeaponShot
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    WeaponShot is the object of support for shoot an enemy. It contains all the useful information like the weapon the player want use, an ArrayList of targetable player,...
    Author:
    mattiamassarini, merklind, thisisferra
    See Also:
